SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Character
The Character class represents a player in the server, stored in the `surveillance_players` database table.
ChatEvent
The ChatEvent class listens for the AsyncPlayerChatEvent and handles the event based on the configuration.
Check
The Check class provides a collection of static utility methods performing boolean checks.
Command
The Command class represents a command issued by a player on the server, stored in the `surveillance_commands` database table.
CommandPreprocessEvent
The CommandPreprocessEvent class listens for the PlayerCommandPreprocessEvent in Minecraft and handles the event based on the configuration.
Compression
The Compression class provides utility methods to Compression.compress(String) and Compression.decompress(byte[]) strings using the GZIP compression algorithm.
DatabaseService
The DatabaseService class is responsible for managing Hibernate configuration and providing utility methods to interact with the database, such as saving, deleting and loading entities.
EnhancedLogger
The EnhancedLogger class extends the standard Java Logger to provide customized logging with colored output and a formatted message prefix.
EnhancedSurveillance
EnhancedSurveillance is a main plugin class.
ES
The ES serves as a singleton holder for the plugin's main instance.
Event
The Event class represents an event occurring in the server, stored in the `surveillance_events` database table.
EventDetails
The EventDetails class is an embeddable entity used to store detailed information about an Event, including the event value (as a byte array) and the location (coordinates and orientation) where the event occurred.
EventsConfiguration
The EventsConfiguration class manages the loading and registration of event listeners and configurations for both Bukkit and Paper events.
ExtMove
The ExtMove class extends the PlayerMoveEvent to include additional information such as the timestamp of when the move event was created.
InteractEntityEvent
The InteractEntityEvent class listens for the PlayerInteractEntityEvent in Minecraft and handles the event based on the configuration.
InteractEvent
The InteractEvent class listens for the PlayerInteractEvent in Minecraft and handles the event based on the configuration.
JoinEvent
The JoinEvent class listens for the PlayerJoinEvent in Minecraft and handles the event based on the configuration.
MemoryService
The MemoryService class manages a pool of threads and internal services responsible for handling plugin operations that run asynchronously, independent of the server's main thread.
Message
The Message class represents a message sent by a player on the server, stored in the `surveillance_messages` database table.
MoveEvent
The MoveEvent class listens for the PlayerMoveEvent in Minecraft and handles the event based on the configuration.
Original
The Original class represents the original form of a Message and Command sent by a player on the server, stored in the `surveillance_originals` database table.
QuitEvent
The QuitEvent class listens for the PlayerQuitEvent in Minecraft and handles the event based on the configuration.
ServerConfiguration
The ServerConfiguration class handles the loading, accessing, and reloading of the server's configuration and translation files.
ToggleFlightEvent
The ToggleFlightEvent class listens for the PlayerToggleFlightEvent in Minecraft and handles the event based on the configuration.
ToggleSneakEvent
The ToggleSneakEvent class listens for the PlayerToggleSneakEvent in Minecraft and handles the event based on the configuration.
ToggleSprintEvent
The ToggleSprintEvent class listens for the PlayerToggleSprintEvent in Minecraft and handles the event based on the configuration.
WorldEntity
The WorldEntity class represents a world in the server, stored in the `surveillance_worlds` database table.
